member.name: T:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits
member.summary: Defines general-purpose flags for the compressed data.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.None
member.summary: No special attributes are set.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.Encrypted
member.summary: If set, indicates that the file is encrypted.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.SizeInformationAfterData
member.summary: If set, the usual CRC-32, compressed size and uncompressed size fields are set to zero and their real values are appended after the data section.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.EnhancedDeflate
member.summary: Reserved for use with method 8 (deflate), for enhanced deflating.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.CompressedPatchedData
member.summary: If set, this indicates that the file is compressed patched data.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.StrongEncrypytion
member.summary: Strong encryption.
member.remarks: If set, you should set the version needed to extract value to at least 50 and you must also set bit 0. If AES encryption is used, the version needed to extract value must be at least 51.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.UnicodeNames
member.summary: Language encoding flag (EFS).
member.remarks: If this bit is set, the filename and comment fields for this file must be encoded using UTF-8.

member.name: F:BeeDevelopment.Zip.ZipFileEntry.AttributeBits.EncryptedHeaders
member.summary: Selected data values in the Local Header are masked to hide their actual values.
